Posts.Content: youngmama wrote: I've noticed some swelling under my left arm, and my arm is sore if I stretch it a certain way.  But there is no swelling to the arm nor hand.  I've had surgery a year ago.  Can those be early signs of lymphedema?  Should I be worried?  Dx 3/8/2011, 6cm+, Stage IIB, Grade 2, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Chemotherapy 3/9/2011 Taxotere (docetaxel) Surgery 7/24/2011 Mastectomy: Left Targeted Therapy 8/1/2011 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Radiation Therapy 9/9/2011 Breast, Lymph nodes Hormonal Therapy 11/24/2011 Surgery 11/19/2014 Reconstruction (left): DIEP flap Log in to post a reply
